title: Drought (D)
creator_credit: Tristram Miall, Robert Loader and Golden Dolphin
brief_description: Powerful introduction to drought and other dramatic aspects of Australia’s climate, including bushfires, floods, cyclones. Examines how native plants and animals have adapted to these conditions, and looks at the history of European occupation. WARNING: Contains disturbing scenes of the agonising death of a herd of wild horses at a dry water hole and recommend viewing suitable for upper secondary student level only.
